Combobox.name: helperText
Combobox.description: Helper text to append to the form control input element.

Combobox.name: helperTextProps
Combobox.description: Props passed to the helper text.

Combobox.name: maxHeight
Combobox.description:
The maxHeight specified for the overlay element.
By default, it will take all space up to the current viewport height.

Combobox.name: offset
Combobox.description:
The additional offset applied along the main axis between the element and its
anchor element.

Combobox.name: placement
Combobox.description: The placement of the element with respect to its anchor element.

Combobox.name: shouldFlip
Combobox.description:
Whether the element should flip its orientation (e.g. top to bottom or left to right) when
there is insufficient room for it to render completely.

Combobox.name: startIcon
Combobox.description: Icon displayed at the start of the combobox.

ComboboxItem.name: startIcon
ComboboxItem.description: Icon added before the item text.

ComboboxSection.name: children
ComboboxSection.description: Static child items or a function to render children.

MultiCombobox.name: maxHeight

MultiCombobox.description: The size of the combobox

MultiCombobox.name: startIcon
MultiCombobox.description: Icon displayed at the start of the combobox.

MultiCombobox.name: shouldFocusWrap
MultiCombobox.description: Whether keyboard navigation is circular.

MultiCombobox.name: allowsCustomValue
MultiCombobox.description: Whether the ComboBox allows a non-item matching input value to be set.

MultiCombobox.name: defaultItems
MultiCombobox.description: The list of ComboBox items (uncontrolled).

MultiCombobox.name: defaultOpen
MultiCombobox.description: Sets the default open state of the menu.

MultiCombobox.name: defaultInputValue
MultiCombobox.description: The default value of the ComboBox input (uncontrolled).

MultiCombobox.name: inputValue
MultiCombobox.description: The value of the ComboBox input (controlled).

MultiCombobox.name: isOpen
MultiCombobox.description: Sets the open state of the menu.

MultiCombobox.name: items
MultiCombobox.description: The list of ComboBox items (controlled).

MultiCombobox.name: menuTrigger
MultiCombobox.description: The interaction required to display the ComboBox menu.

MultiCombobox.name: name
MultiCombobox.description: The name of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#htmlattrdefname).

MultiCombobox.name: onInputChange
MultiCombobox.description: Handler that is called when the ComboBox input value changes.

MultiCombobox.name: onOpenChange
MultiCombobox.description: Method that is called when the open state of the menu changes. Returns the new open state and the action that caused the opening of the menu.

MultiCombobox.name: css
MultiCombobox.description: Theme aware style object.
